review: My husband's in grad school and I don't know what it is he does with his binders but halfway through a semester, they would always end up falling apart! So before his classes started this time I looked into this a bit and tried to find one that might actually last him an entire semester. Well... these really are the "STRONGEST" out there! He finishes this semester in a week and a half and this thing is not only in one piece but in very good condition and he'll be able to use it next semester too.
productTitle: Wilson Jones Heavy Duty Round Ring View Binder with Extra Durable Hinge, 2 Inch, Customizable, Light Blue (W363-44-2925)
